1.text: Check yourself out in the mirror.

2.text: Invest in a good pair of scissors.

5.vid: /1/16/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.vid: /c/cd/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.vid: /4/42/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.vid: /3/3f/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.vid: /e/e0/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Comb your hair out and examine your layers.
10.vid: /3/3b/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Make a ponytail at the top of your head.
11.vid: /2/24/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Slide the elastic down the length of your hair.
12.vid: /4/4c/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Cut off the end of your hair.
13.vid: /3/33/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

14.text: Remove the elastic and examine your layers.
14.vid: /0/0e/Layer Cut Your Own Hair Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4
